T.query: SELECT su.id as suid, s.id as sid, ms.id as msid FROM subjects su join sites s on su.site_id = s.id join medidata_sites ms on s.external_id= ms.id where ( s.study_id = 38 and su.randomized_at ='2013-11-22 15:52:08-05') or (su.regime_id = 14 and  su.randomized_at ='2013-10-08 22:44:26-04' and su.removed_from_dispensing = 'f') or (s.id = 8 and su.regime_id = 13);

F.query: SELECT su.id as suid, s.id as sid, ms.id as msid FROM subjects su join sites s on su.site_id = s.id join medidata_sites ms on s.external_id= ms.id where ( s.study_id = 38 and su.randomized_at ='2013-11-22 15:49:04-05') or (su.regime_id = 14 and  su.randomized_at ='2013-10-08 22:44:26-04' and su.removed_from_dispensing = 'f') or (s.id = 8 and su.regime_id = 13);

SELECT su.id as suid, s.id as sid, ms.id as msid FROM subjects su join sites s on su.site_id = s.id join medidata_sites ms on s.external_id= ms.id where ( s.study_id = 38 and su.randomized_at <'2013-11-22 15:52:08-05') or (su.regime_id = 14 and  su.randomized_at ='2013-10-08 22:44:26-04' and su.removed_from_dispensing = 'f') or (s.id = 8 and su.regime_id = 13);

SELECT su.id as suid, s.id as sid, ms.id as msid FROM subjects su join sites s on su.site_id = s.id join medidata_sites ms on s.external_id= ms.id where ( s.study_id = 38 and su.randomized_at ='2013-11-22 15:52:08-05') or (su.regime_id = 14 and  su.randomized_at ='2013-10-08 22:44:26-04' and su.removed_from_dispensing = 'f') or (s.id = 8 and su.regime_id = 13 and su.id = 260);

SELECT su.id as suid, s.id as sid, ms.id as msid FROM subjects su join sites s on su.site_id = s.id join medidata_sites ms on s.external_id= ms.id where ( s.study_id = 38 and su.created_at ='2013-11-22 15:52:08-05') or (su.regime_id = 14 and  su.randomized_at ='2013-10-08 22:44:26-04' and su.removed_from_dispensing = 'f') or (s.id = 8 and su.regime_id = 13);

SELECT su.id as suid, s.id as sid, ms.id as msid FROM subjects su join sites s on su.site_id = s.id join medidata_sites ms on s.external_id= ms.id where ( s.study_id = 38 and su.randomized_at ='2013-11-22 15:52:08-05') or (su.regime_id = 14 and  su.randomized_at ='2013-10-08 22:44:26-04' and su.removed_from_dispensing = 'f') or (s.id = 8);

SELECT su.id as suid, s.id as sid, ms.id as msid FROM subjects su join sites s on su.site_id = s.id join medidata_sites ms on s.external_id= ms.id where ( s.study_id = 38 and su.randomized_at ='2013-11-22 15:49:04-05') or (su.regime_id = 14 and su.remove_from_rand ='f' and su.randomized_at ='2013-10-08 22:54:58-04') or (s.id = 8 );
